author: alexdma
msg: Merging latest refactor engine changes [1301611:1302384] into branch

author: scottbw
msg: Modified the getAvailableWidgets method of the connector to accept both 0.9.x and 0.10.x metadata formats so as to be backwards compatible with earlier Wookie server instances (see WOOKIE-330). Also updated the getOrCreateInstance method to use the REST API and not the legacy WidgetServiceServlet.

author: gstein
msg: Perform a bunch of cleanup on the mirrors.cgi script:
- FIXED: the script switches to its own dir to locate ezt. no need for
- FIXED: set path_info to '' for the root path to avoid double-'/'
- update license header to current standard
- simplify some code using modern pythonisms (eg .get(), string methods)
